citation.article-title: Description of Idiomarina insulisalsae sp. nov., isolated from the soil of a sea salt evaporation pond, proposal to transfer the species of the genus Pseudidiomarina to the genus Idiomarina and emended description of the genus Idiomarina

p.s: Description of Idiomarina tainanensis comb. nov.
Idiomarina tainanensis (tai.nan.en'sis. N.L. fem. adj. tainanensis pertaining to Tainan, Taiwan, where the type strain was isolated).
Basonym: Pseudidiomarina tainanensis Jean et al. [10].
The description is identical to that given for Pseudidiomarina tainanensis by Jean et al. [10].
The type strain, PIN1T (=BCRC 17750T=JCM 15084T), was isolated from shallow coastal seawater of An-Ping Harbour, Tainan, Taiwan.
